value:
Order of Heroeses! What's that?
What's that? What's that? We
like the soundses of it!

There are manys of us and
ones of us, all in oneses. That
stick in your headses?

What's this? Going round and
round again? Have timeses to
waste? Uwee hee hee!

Clarisse in our group. Clarisse cold.
Reese also in group. Reese is ones
we hate. But also like!

How do we trains? We fights
ourselveses until ones of us dies.
Then practiceses over!

We is us. We friendses with
$Nf.$k$pAnd friendses with youses too.
Uwee hee hee!

We great of them allses!
Uwee hee hee!

We allses are...better than
thises.
We allses are uselesses.

Come on! Come on! Come on!
Timeses to fight!

Whuh? Whoses are youses? We are
Legion...and we are Legion too.
Uwe hee hee!

We allses are strong now?
Strong-strong? Uwe hee hee!$k$pWe allses wonder somethings.
Why youses use Legion?$k$pWe know. But we don't. We
know but don't. But we
have guess.$k$pLegion is broken. Our heartses.
Rest of us allses too. Like
we allses are brokenses.$k$pLegion likes you. We allses think
you don't hate us. But we
too broken to know.$k$pWe makes you promises.
We stand by youses. Forevers
and forevers! Uwee hee!

いーあ
うああっ！
Wha?
Come on! Come on! Come on!
Moreses, moreses, moreses!
Fight, fight, fight!
Mwaa ha ha!
Deadses...?
Uwee hee hee!
Uwee hee hee! Time for us allses?
Want to see under the maskses, hmm?
Legion always gets the jobses done.
Yes, yes, yes! We are allses brotherses.
Legion is many, many, many. Yes, yes, yes!
Which one am...I? Legion doesn't knowses!
Legion likes the lookses of youses.
Yes, yes, yes!
Allses of us!
We are ready!
